TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Though I have searched tirelessly, I have found no trace of any of my fellow Nomai.. I am alone.
CASSAVA: Everywhere I search, the star system has been engulfed by this dreadful danger, only visible to the third eye.
CASSAVA: My sole solace is the survival of several species native to the star system.. I am certain the property of immersion must be the reason for their continued survival.
CASSAVA: But that means.. If any of them were to ever return to the planet's surface...
CASSAVA: What.. What a terrifying thought..

CASSAVA: What a miracle that the planet's thick clouds obscured my sight of anything outside <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep..</color> I owe them my deepest gratitude for protecting the native species from harm.
